relationships.description: The Sorting Hat initially considered sorting Harry into Slytherin house, but ultimately decided against it.
Harry was sorted into Gryffindor house during the Sorting Ceremony.
Ron was also sorted into Gryffindor house during the Sorting Ceremony.
Hermione was also sorted into Gryffindor house during the Sorting Ceremony.
Harry and Ron are friends, as mentioned in the text.
